member.summary: Do connection to server.

item.description: args[0] is IP adress of server.
If args.length < 2 then default port is choose, if args.length < 1 then local adress is use as ip.

percentage from 0 to 100.

member.name: M:ClientLibrary.robot.ClientRobot.Scan(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Robot make scan to angle and witch precision. That is mean if scanned robot is in angle to robot in range (angle - precision, angle+precision) it is success.
member.param: in degree. 0 is 3 hour. 90 is 6 hour and so on. 12 hour in up.
parameter for sector. Min is 0 max is 10
